00037 MainWindow::MainWindow(QApplication &app, ElementDatabase& db)
00038         : QMainWindow(),
00039           Ui::MainWindow(),
00040           mApp(&app), 
00041           mCompleter(NULL),
00042           mLangPath(":/lang"),
00043           mInputData(db),
00044           mDB(&db),
00045           mDataVisualizer(this, db)
00046 {
00047         mApp->installTranslator(&mTranslator);
00048 #ifdef DEBUG
00049         if ( ! mLangPath.exists() ) 
00050                 std::cerr << "Unable to determine language directory !" << std::endl;
00051 #endif
00052 
00053         setupUi(this);
00054 
00055         mFormulaDefaultPalette = ntrFormula->palette();
00056         tblResult->setModel(&mModel);
00057 
00058         // action setup (menu bar)
00059         menuFile = new QMenu(menubar);
00060         menuTools = new QMenu(menubar);
00061         menuLang = new QMenu(menubar);
00062         menuHelp = new QMenu(menubar);
00063         addActions();
00064         connect(actionQuit, SIGNAL(triggered()), &app, SLOT(quit()));
00065         connect(&app, SIGNAL(lastWindowClosed()), &app, SLOT(quit()));
00066         connect(actionAbout_Qt, SIGNAL(triggered()), &app, SLOT(aboutQt()));
00067         connect(actionAbout, SIGNAL(triggered()), this, SLOT(about()));
00068         connect(actionVisualizeData, SIGNAL(triggered()), &mDataVisualizer, SLOT(show()));
00069         connect(actionUseSystemLocale, SIGNAL(triggered()), this, SLOT(useSystemLocaleTriggered()));
00070         selectDefaultLang();
00071         actionUseSystemLocale->trigger();
00072 
00073         // action setup result table
00074         connect(actionExpandAll, SIGNAL(triggered()), this, SLOT(expandAll()));
00075         connect(actionCollapseAll, SIGNAL(triggered()), this, SLOT(collapseAll()));
00076         connect(actionSelectAll, SIGNAL(triggered()), tblResult, SLOT(selectAll()));
00077         connect(actionCopySelection, SIGNAL(triggered()), this, SLOT(copyResultTableSelection()));
00078         connect(tblResult, SIGNAL(expanded(const QModelIndex&)), this, SLOT(expandItem(const QModelIndex&)));
00079         connect(tblResult, SIGNAL(collapsed(const QModelIndex&)), this, SLOT(expandItem(const QModelIndex&)));
00080 
00081         // populate list of all known GUI input fields
00082         mFormEntries.append(FormEntry(ntrFormula,   "currentText", lblFormula));
00083         mFormEntries.append(FormEntry(ntrDensity,   "value", lblDensity));
00084         mFormEntries.append(FormEntry(ntrXrayEn,    "value", lblXrayEn));
00085         mFormEntries.append(FormEntry(ntrNeutronWl, "value", lblNeutronWl));
00086         saveInitialInput();
00087 
00088         // button connectors
00089         connect(btnClear, SIGNAL(clicked()), this, SLOT(resetInput()));
00090         connect(btnAddAlias, SIGNAL(clicked()), this, SLOT(addAlias()));
00091         connect(btnCalc, SIGNAL(clicked()), this, SLOT(doCalc()));
00092 
00093         if (ntrFormula->lineEdit()) {
00094                 mCompleter = new FormulaCompleter(db, ntrFormula->lineEdit(), btnCalc);
00095                 connect(ntrFormula->lineEdit(), SIGNAL(returnPressed()), btnCalc, SLOT(animateClick()));
00096         }
00097         connect(ntrDensity, SIGNAL(editingFinished()), btnCalc, SLOT(animateClick()));
00098         connect(ntrXrayEn, SIGNAL(editingFinished()), btnCalc, SLOT(animateClick()));
00099         connect(ntrNeutronWl, SIGNAL(editingFinished()), btnCalc, SLOT(animateClick()));
00100 
00101         connect(lblFormattedFormula, SIGNAL(linkActivated(const QString&)), 
00102                 this, SLOT(showElementData(const QString&)));
00103         connect(&mDataVisualizer, SIGNAL(elementLinkActivated(const QString&)), 
00104                 this, SLOT(showElementData(const QString&)));
00105 }

00107 // try to determine the desired language file from system locale
00108 // otherwise use the english translation
00109 void MainWindow::selectDefaultLang()
00110 {
00111         QString locale = QLocale::system().name();
00112 #if DEBUG
00113         std::cerr << "locale: " << locale.toAscii().data() << std::endl;
00114 #endif
00115         QStringList filters;
00116         filters << "language_*"+locale+".qm";
00117         QStringList langFiles(mLangPath.entryList(filters, QDir::Files));
00118         if (! langFiles.empty()) 
00119         {
00120                 loadLanguage(langFiles.front());
00121         } else {
00122                 loadLanguage("language_en_GB.qm");
00123         }
00124 }
00125 
00126 void MainWindow::loadLanguage(const QString& filename)
00127 {
00128         QString absFilePath(mLangPath.absoluteFilePath(filename));
00129         if ( !QFile::exists(absFilePath) ||
00130              !mTranslator.load(filename, mLangPath.canonicalPath()) )
00131         {
00132 #if DEBUG
00133                 std::cerr << "Could not load translation file '"
00134                         << filename.toStdString() << "' !";
00135 #endif
00136         }
00137         mLangFile = filename;
00138         retranslateUi();
00139 }

00182 
00183 void MainWindow::useSystemLocaleTriggered()
00184 {
00185         // reformat spinbox values
00186         if (actionUseSystemLocale->isChecked()) {
00187                 // use system settings for decimal operator
00188                 mLocale = QLocale::system();
00189         } else  {
00190                 // force . decimal operator
00191                 mLocale = QLocale::c();
00192         }
00193         // disable decimal grouping
00194         mLocale.setNumberOptions(QLocale::OmitGroupSeparator|QLocale::RejectGroupSeparator);
00195         // reconfigure input fields
00196         ntrDensity->setLocale(mLocale);
00197         ntrXrayEn->setLocale(mLocale);
00198         ntrNeutronWl->setLocale(mLocale);
00199         // reload the current language file
00200         loadLanguage(mLangFile);
00201 }

00203 void MainWindow::about()
00204 {
00205         QMessageBox::about(this, mAboutTitle, mAboutText);
00206 }

00208 // creates a menu of available languages out of the available translation files
00209 void MainWindow::updateLangActions(QMenu * menuLang)
00210 {
00211         // get all available language files
00212         QStringList filters;
00213         filters << "language_*.qm";
00214         QStringList langFiles(mLangPath.entryList(filters, QDir::Files));
00215         menuLang->clear();
00216         
00217         // create a menu entry for using the system locale for decimal ops
00218         menuLang->addAction(actionUseSystemLocale);
00219 
00220         // build the language selection menu
00221         LangActionList::iterator lit = mLangActionList.begin();
00222         for(; lit != mLangActionList.end(); lit++) delete *lit;
00223         mLangActionList.clear();
00224         QStringList::const_iterator fit = langFiles.begin();
00225         while(fit != langFiles.end()) {
00226                 // the display name equals the filename directly
00227                 // (but is Qtranslated to a more beautiful name)
00228                 LangAction * act = new LangAction(this, *fit);
00229                 menuLang->addAction(act);
00230                 connect(act, SIGNAL(triggered(const QString&)), this, SLOT(loadLanguage(const QString&)));
00231                 mLangActionList.push_back(act);
00232                 fit++;
00233         }
00234         if (langFiles.empty())
00235         {
00236                 QAction * act = new QAction(this);
00237                 act->setText("No language file found!");
00238                 menuLang->addAction(act);
00239                 connect(act, SIGNAL(triggered()), this, SLOT(selectDefaultLang()));
00240                 mLangActionList.push_back(act);
00241         }
00242 }

00244 void MainWindow::addActions()
00245 {

00250         menubar->addAction(menuTools->menuAction());

00252         // language menu
00253         menubar->addAction(menuLang->menuAction());
00254         // help menu
00255         menubar->addAction(menuHelp->menuAction());
00256         menuHelp->addAction(actionAbout_Qt);
00257         menuHelp->addAction(actionAbout);
00258         // results table widget
00259         tblResult->addAction(actionExpandAll);
00260         tblResult->addAction(actionCollapseAll);
00261         tblResult->addAction(actionSelectAll);
00262         tblResult->addAction(actionCopySelection);
00263         tblResult->setContextMenuPolicy(Qt::ActionsContextMenu);
00264 }

00266 void MainWindow::saveInitialInput()
00267 {
00268         foreach(FormEntry fe, mFormEntries) {
00269                 QVariant var(fe.widget->property(fe.propertyName.latin1()));
00270                 if (var.isValid()) 
00271                         mInputData.setInit(fe.widget->objectName(), var);
00272         }
00273 }
00274 
00275 void MainWindow::saveInput()
00276 {
00277         foreach(FormEntry fe, mFormEntries) {
00278                 QVariant var(fe.widget->property(fe.propertyName.latin1()));
00279                 if (var.isValid()) {
00280                         mInputData.set(fe.widget->objectName(), var);
00281                 }
00282         }
00283 }
00284 
00285 void MainWindow::resetInput()
00286 {
00287         foreach(FormEntry fe, mFormEntries) {
00288                 QVariant var(mInputData.getInit(fe.widget->objectName()));
00289                 if (var.isValid())
00290                         fe.widget->setProperty(fe.propertyName.latin1(), var);
00291         }
00292         clearResultTable();
00293         setFormattedFormula();
00294 }
00295 
00296 void MainWindow::doCalc()
00297 {
00298         saveInput();
00299         ntrFormula->setPalette(mFormulaDefaultPalette);
00300         try {
00301                 mInputData.interpretFormula(ntrFormula->objectName());
00302         } catch(const cfp::Error& e) {
00303                 size_t start, length;
00304                 const char * eStr = e.what(start, length);
00305                 lblFormattedFormula->setText(eStr);
00306 
00307                 QPalette pal(ntrFormula->palette());
00308                 pal.setColor(QPalette::Text, Qt::red);
00309                 ntrFormula->setPalette(pal);
00310                 if (length == 0) start = ntrFormula->currentText().length();
00311                 QLineEdit * lineEdit = ntrFormula->lineEdit();
00312                 if (lineEdit) {
00313                         lineEdit->setCursorPosition(start);
00314                         lineEdit->setSelection(start, length);
00315                 }
00316                 return;
00317         }
00318         rebuildResultTable();
00319 }
00320 
00321 void MainWindow::addAlias()
00322 {
00323         if (formulaIsEmpty()) return;
00324         doCalc();
00325         AliasNameDialog askForAlias(this);
00326         int result = askForAlias.exec();
00327         if (result == QDialog::Accepted) {
00328                 mInputData.addAlias(askForAlias.name());
00329         }
00330 }
00331 
00332 void MainWindow::setFormattedFormula()
00333 {
00334         if (formulaIsEmpty()) {
00335                 lblFormattedFormula->setText("");
00336                 return;
00337         }
00338         QString s;
00339         foreach(cfp::CompoundElement e, mInputData.empiricalFormula())
00340         {
00341                 s.append(DataVisualizer::getLinkText(e));
00342         }
00343         lblFormattedFormula->setText(s);
00344 }
00345 
00346 void MainWindow::fillResultTable() 
00347 {
00348         setFormattedFormula();
00349 
00350         resultAddData("number of electrons", false);
00351         resultAddData("molecular mass g/mol", false);
00352         resultAddData("molecular volume nm^3", false);
00353         resultAddData("neutron scattering", true);
00354         resultAddData("xray scattering", true);
00355         resultAddInput();
00356 
00357         QStringList headerLabels;
00358         headerLabels << tr("Characteristic") << tr("Value");
00359         mModel.setHorizontalHeaderLabels(headerLabels);
00360         tblResult->resizeColumnToContents(0);
00361 }

00363 QString MainWindow::qstringFromDouble(double d) const
00364 {
00365         return mLocale.toString(d);
00366 }
00367 
00368 QString MainWindow::qstringFromComplex(complex c) const
00369 {
00370         QString str;
00371         if (c.real() != 0.0) str.append(qstringFromDouble(c.real()));
00372         if (c.imag() != 0.0) {
00373                 if (c.imag() < 0) str.append("-");
00374                 else              str.append("+");
00375                 str.append("i");
00376                 str.append(qstringFromDouble(fabs(c.imag())));
00377         }
00378         if (str.isEmpty()) str.append("0");
00379         return str;
00380 }
00381 
00382 QString MainWindow::qstringFromVariant(const QVariant& var) const
00383 {
00384         QString result;
00385 
00386         if (var.isValid()) {
00387                 // single double number
00388                 if (var.canConvert(QVariant::Double)) 
00389                 {
00390                         result = qstringFromDouble(var.toDouble());
00391                 // complex number package
00392                 } else if (var.canConvert(QVariant::List)) 
00393                 {
00394                         QVariantList list = var.toList();
00395                         if (list.size() == 2) {
00396                                 complex c(list.front().toDouble(),
00397                                           list.back().toDouble());
00398                                 result = qstringFromComplex(c);
00399                         }
00400                 } else if (var.canConvert(QVariant::String)) 
00401                 {
00402                         result = var.toString();
00403                 }
00404         }
00405         return result;
00406 }
00407 
00408 void MainWindow::clearResultTable()
00409 {
00410         mModel.clear();
00411 }

00413 void MainWindow::rebuildResultTable()
00414 {
00415         clearResultTable();
00416         if (!formulaIsEmpty()) fillResultTable();
00417 }
00418 
00419 void MainWindow::appendVariantMap(QStandardItem * parent, const QString& name, const QVariantMap& map)
00420 {
00421         if (!parent) return;
00422 
00423         QList<QStandardItem *> itemList;
00424 
00425         // insert parent item with title and value, eventually
00426         QStandardItem * parentItem = new QStandardItem(name);
00427         QString parentValueKey("value");
00428         itemList.append(parentItem);
00429         QVariantMap::const_iterator valueIter = map.constFind(parentValueKey);
00430         if (valueIter != map.constEnd()) {
00431                 itemList.append(
00432                         new QStandardItem(
00433                                 qstringFromVariant(valueIter.value()) ));
00434         } else {
00435                 itemList.append(new QStandardItem());
00436         }
00437         parent->appendRow(itemList);
00438 
00439         // add a row for each compound element
00440         QVariantMap::const_iterator it = map.constBegin();
00441         while (it != map.constEnd()) 
00442         {
00443                 if (parentValueKey != it.key()) // bad thing, but yet no alternative
00444                 {
00445                         appendVariant(parentItem, 
00446                                       tr(it.key().toStdString().c_str()), 
00447                                       it.value());
00448                 }
00449                 ++it;
00450         }
00451 }
00452 
00453 void MainWindow::appendVariant(QStandardItem * parent, const QString& name, const QVariant& var)
00454 {
00455         if (!parent) return;
00456 
00457         if (var.isValid() && var.type() == QVariant::Map)
00458         {
00459                 appendVariantMap(parent, name, var.toMap());
00460         } else {
00461                 QList<QStandardItem *> itemList;
00462                 itemList.append(new QStandardItem(name));
00463                 itemList.append(new QStandardItem(
00464                         qstringFromVariant(var) ));
00465                 parent->appendRow(itemList);
00466         } 
00467 }
00468 
00469 void MainWindow::resultAddData(const char * key, bool expand)
00470 {
00471         if (!key) return;
00472 
00473         appendVariant(mModel.invisibleRootItem(), tr(key), mInputData.get(key));
00474         if (expand) {
00475                 QStandardItem * root = mModel.invisibleRootItem();
00476                 if (root) {
00477                         int idx = root->rowCount()-1;
00478                         if (idx >= 0) {
00479                                 QStandardItem * item = mModel.item(idx);
00480                                 if (item) {
00481                                         tblResult->expand(item->index());
00482                                 }
00483                         }
00484                 }
00485         }
00486 }
00487 
00488 void MainWindow::resultAddInput()
00489 {
00490         QStandardItem * group = new QStandardItem(tr("Input Form Data"));
00491         mModel.appendRow(group);
00492         foreach(FormEntry fe, mFormEntries)
00493         {
00494                 QStandardItem * item = NULL;
00495                 QList<QStandardItem *> itemList;
00496 
00497                 // create a cell for the label (incl. unit suffix)
00498                 QString label(fe.label->text());
00499                 QVariant var(fe.widget->property("suffix"));
00500                 if (var.isValid() && var.canConvert(QVariant::String)) {
00501                         label = label+" ("+var.toString().mid(1)+")";
00502                 }
00503                 item = new QStandardItem(label);
00504                 itemList.append(item);
00505 
00506                 // create a cell for the value
00507                 var = mInputData.get(fe.widget->objectName());
00508                 if (var.isValid() && var.canConvert(QVariant::String))
00509                 {
00510                         if ( var.type() == QVariant::Double ) 
00511                         {
00512                                 item = new QStandardItem(
00513                                         qstringFromVariant(var));
00514                         } else {
00515                                 item = new QStandardItem(var.toString());
00516                         }
00517                 } else {
00518                         item = new QStandardItem();
00519                 }
00520 
00521                 // add the items (a row) to the model
00522                 itemList.append(item);
00523                 group->appendRow(itemList);
00524         }
00525 }
00526 
00527 void appendSubItems(QString& str, QStandardItem * parent, QItemSelectionModel * selection)
00528 {
00529         if (!parent || !parent->hasChildren()) return;
00530         for(int row=0; row < parent->rowCount(); row++) 
00531         {
00532                 if (/*selection->isSelected(parent->index()) ||*/
00533                     selection->rowIntersectsSelection(row, parent->index()) )
00534                 {
00535                         QStandardItem * child;
00536                         QString rowString;
00537                         bool appendRow = false;
00538                         for(int col=0; col < parent->columnCount(); col++)
00539                         {
00540                                 child = parent->child(row, col);
00541                                 if (child && 
00542                                     (selection->isSelected(child->index()) /*||
00543                                      selection->isSelected(parent->index())*/ ))
00544                                 {
00545                                         QVariant var(child->index().data());
00546                                         if (var.canConvert(QVariant::String)) {
00547                                                 rowString.append(var.toString());
00548                                                 appendRow = true;
00549                                         }
00550                                 }
00551                                 if (col < parent->columnCount()-1) {
00552                                         rowString.append(";");
00553                                 }
00554                         }
00555                         rowString.append("\n");
00556                         if (appendRow) str.append(rowString);
00557                 }
00558                 appendSubItems(str, parent->child(row, 0), selection);
00559         }
00560 }
00561 
00562 void MainWindow::copyResultTableSelection()
00563 {
00564         QString exportData;
00565         QItemSelectionModel * selection = tblResult->selectionModel();
00566         QModelIndexList selected(selection->selectedIndexes());
00567         if (selected.size() == 1) {
00568                 QVariant var(selected.back().data());
00569                 if (var.canConvert(QVariant::String)) {
00570                         exportData.append(var.toString());
00571                 }
00572         } else {
00573                 appendSubItems(exportData, mModel.invisibleRootItem(), selection);
00574         }
00575         mApp->clipboard()->clear();
00576         mApp->clipboard()->setText(exportData, QClipboard::Clipboard);
00577         mApp->clipboard()->setText(exportData, QClipboard::Selection);
00578 }
00579 
00580 void addModelEntry(QStandardItem * item, 
00581                    QString label, 
00582                    QString val1 = QString(), 
00583                    QString val2 = QString())
00584 {
00585         if (!item) return;
00586         QList<QStandardItem *> itemList;
00587         itemList.append(new QStandardItem(label));
00588         if (!val1.isEmpty()) itemList.append(new QStandardItem(val1));
00589         if (!val2.isEmpty()) itemList.append(new QStandardItem(val2));
00590         item->appendRow(itemList);
00591 }
00592 
00593 QString MainWindow::toString(const Element::PropertyVariant& var) const
00594 {
00595         if (Element::isValidVariant(var)) {
00596                 return QString(boost::apply_visitor(QStringFromBoostVariant(this), var));
00597         } else {
00598                 return QString(tr("invalid"));
00599         }
00600 }
00601 
00602 void MainWindow::showElementData(const QString& key)
00603 {
00604         clearResultTable();
00605         Element::Ptr ep = mDB->getElement(key);
00606         if (ep.isNull()) {
00607                 cfp::Compound comp = mDB->getAlias(key);
00608                 if (comp.size() > 0) {
00609                         ntrFormula->setEditText(QString::fromStdString(cfp::toString(comp)));
00610                         doCalc();
00611                 } else {
00612 #ifdef DEBUG
00613                         std::cerr << "MainWindow::showElementData: '"
00614                                   << key.toStdString()
00615                                   <<"' not found in Database !" << std::endl;
00616 #endif
00617                 }
00618                 return;
00619         }
00620         QStandardItem * root = mModel.invisibleRootItem();
00621         QStandardItem * item = root;
00622         QStringFromBoostVariant qstringFromBoostVariant(this);
00623         Element::PropertyValueIteratorConst it = ep->beginConst();
00624         int propCount = Element::propertyCount() - 1;
00625         for(int i=0; i < propCount; i++)
00626         {
00627                 Element::Property prop = Element::getProperty(i);
00628                 QString valueStr = toString(ep->propertyConst(prop));
00629                 if (prop == Element::NUCLEONS_PROPERTY)
00630                 {
00631                         if (!ep->isIsotope()) {
00632                                 valueStr = tr("natural mixture");
00633                         }
00634                 }
00635                 if (prop == Element::NS_L_COHERENT_PROPERTY) // first one
00636                 {
00637                         item = new QStandardItem(tr("neutron scattering"));
00638                         root->appendRow(item);
00639                 }
00640                 addModelEntry(item,
00641                               tr(Element::propertyName(prop)), valueStr);
00642         }
00643 
00644         if (ep->isIsotope()) { 
00645                 // has no xray-scattering data, 
00646                 // use that of the natural element (without nucleon number)
00647                 ep = mDB->getElement(ElementDatabase::KeyType(ep->symbol().c_str()));
00648                 if (ep.isNull()) 
00649                 {
00650 #ifdef DEBUG
00651                         std::cerr << "MainWindow::showElementData: '"
00652                                 << ep->symbol().c_str()
00653                                 <<"' not found in Database !" << std::endl;
00654 #endif
00655                         return;
00656                 }
00657         }
00658         QStringList headerLabels;
00659         headerLabels << tr("Characteristic") << tr("Value");
00660         if (!ep->xrayCoefficients().empty())
00661         {
00662                 item = new QStandardItem(tr("xray scattering"));
00663                 root->appendRow(item);
00664                 addModelEntry(item, tr("anomalous scattering coefficients"));
00665                 addModelEntry(item, tr("energy"), tr("fp"), tr("fpp"));
00666                 MapTriple::const_iterator it = ep->xrayCoefficients().begin();
00667                 MapTriple::const_iterator end = ep->xrayCoefficients().end();
00668                 while(it != end) {
00669                         addModelEntry(item, 
00670                                 qstringFromDouble(it->first), 
00671                                 qstringFromDouble(it->second.first), 
00672                                 qstringFromDouble(it->second.second));
00673                         it++;
00674                 }
00675                 headerLabels << tr("Value");
00676         }
00677         mModel.setHorizontalHeaderLabels(headerLabels);
00678         tblResult->resizeColumnToContents(0);
00679         tblResult->resizeColumnToContents(1);
00680         tblResult->resizeColumnToContents(2);
00681 }
00682 
00683 void MainWindow::expandAll()
00684 {
00685         tblResult->expandAll();
00686         expandItem();
00687 }
00688 
00689 void MainWindow::collapseAll()
00690 {
00691         tblResult->collapseAll();
00692         expandItem();
00693 }
00694 
00695 void MainWindow::expandItem(const QModelIndex& index)
00696 {
00697         int colWidthSum = 0;
00698         for(int i=0; i < 3; i++) {
00699                 tblResult->resizeColumnToContents(i);
00700                 colWidthSum += tblResult->columnWidth(i);
00701         }
00702         int visibleWidth = tblResult->viewport()->width();
00703 
00704         int scrollBarWidth = 0;
00705         QScrollBar * vscroll = tblResult->verticalScrollBar();
00706         if (vscroll) scrollBarWidth = vscroll->sizeHint().width();
00707         if (!vscroll->isVisible()) visibleWidth -= scrollBarWidth;
00708 
00709         int margin = width() - visibleWidth;
00710         QSize mainSize(size());
00711 
00712         mainSize.setWidth( colWidthSum + margin );
00713         colWidthSum -= scrollBarWidth;
00714         if (colWidthSum != visibleWidth) resize(mainSize);
00715 }
00716 
00717 bool MainWindow::formulaIsEmpty() const
00718 {
00719         return ntrFormula->currentText().isEmpty();
00720 }
